backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user authorization, profile storage, and CRUD operations for dated entry records with validation and stable memory handling.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend source files including utilities, components, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering DataEntryPage and global Toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsSection: Analytics UI component showing monthly or yearly bar charts based on aggregated entry data.
frontend/src/components/AuthStatusBar.ts: Authentication status bar showing sign‑in state and providing Internet Identity login/logout actions.
frontend/src/components/EntriesTable.tsx: Displays entries in a table with edit/delete dialogs and form validation, using update and delete mutations.
frontend/src/features/entries/queries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for listing, creating, updating, and deleting entries with authorization-aware error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and state tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles and a light/dark theme with custom CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DataEntryPage.tsx: Implements the main data entry UI with validation, entry creation, imports/exports, and entries display.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty type declaration placeholder for jsPDF.
frontend/src/types/xlsx.d.ts: Empty type declaration placeholder for XLSX.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Provides helpers to aggregate entries by month and year and extract available years.
frontend/src/utils/authErrors.ts: Provides helpers to detect authorization errors and return predefined sign‑in prompt messages.
frontend/src/utils/date.ts: Parses YYYY‑MM‑DD strings to Date objects and computes whole‑day differences from today.
frontend/src/utils/entriesCSVImport.ts: Parses and validates CSV rows into structured entry data, mapping headers and collecting errors.
frontend/src/utils/entriesImportExport.t: Builds export rows and supports CSV and text table export of entries, including timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/utils/entriesPdfExport.ts: Generates a printable HTML table for entries and opens it for browser PDF printing.
frontend/src/utils/entriesXlsxExport.ts: Exports entries as CSV-formatted data with .xlsx filename for Excel compatibility.
frontend/src/utils/entriesXlsxImport.ts: Parses XLSX/CSV files as CSV text, mapping headers and validating rows into structured entry data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Provides validation helpers for required fields, mobile numbers, and amounts, returning structured ValidationResult objects.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, existing features, issues, and architectural notes for expanding the app to full CRUD with import/export and improved auth handling.
